DOC.brief_summary: This placebo-controlled study investigates acetyl-L-carnitine in the treatment of septic shock requiring vasopressors.
DOC.brief_title: Acetyl-L-Carnitine in the Treatment of Septic Shock
DOC.detailed_description: This is a cross-over study which infuses ALC for 12 out of 18 hours (and placebo the other 6). Patients must have vasopressor-dependent septic shock and be free from renal failure, hepatic failure, and seizures to be eligible.
DOC.criteria: documented or presumed infection shock requiring vasopressors dialysis hepatic failure seizures
